location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Captain Cook, Commander of the Hope

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, and some of the date has been obscured as a result, leaving ... July ...07.

mods.abstract: The letter is a request that Captain Cook deliver a package to the Governor in Council, Bombay and a letter to the Resident at Muscat.The dates of the surrounding correspondence suggest that the date of this letter lies between 20-22 July 1807.
